name: An Fhoraois Spiorad (The Spirit Forest)
description:
== An Fhoraois Spioraid ==

A small 3D scene created for a college assignment. An Fhoraois Spioraid takes place in a mysterious part of an Irish forest, where the Tuatha Dé Danann (Fairies) are said to reside.

Assets used:

Particle Ribbon by Moonflower Carnivore

GreenForest by Purple Jump

Classic Skybox by MGSVEVO

First Person Drifter Controller by torahhorse

Music/Sound:

Northern Lullaby by Sergey Cheremisinov

Sound effects by Debrup Travel and Films
